variable.name: SUBJ_NO
variable.description: Subject ID
variable.comment: De-identified ID, unique subject ID for dbGaP

variable.name: SEX
variable.description: Gender: male or female

variable.name: Dx_Level
variable.description: Diagnosis level (determined from the combination of CLINDEM, DEMDX, and NOTDEMCI)
variable.value: Unspecified dementia or Dementia by family report
Missing data, unconfirmed control, control with another neurological disease, Down syndrome, mild cognitive Impairment, other

variable.name: Case_Control
variable.description: Affection status (strict; collapsed from "Dx_Level" variable)

variable.name: RecruitedAsControl
variable.description: Subject was recruited as a control (some have since converted; see "Dx_Level" variable)

variable.name: ConType
variable.description: Type of control

variable.name: BirthYr
variable.description: Subject's year of birth

variable.name: AgeAtLastEval
variable.description: Subject's age at last evaluation

variable.name: VitalSt
variable.description: The subject's last known vital status was: alive or dead?

variable.name: AgeDeath
variable.description: At what age did the subject die?

variable.name: Autopsy
variable.description: Has an autopsy been performed?

variable.name: Race
variable.description: Subject's race

variable.name: Hispanic
variable.description: Is the subject Spanish/Hispanic/Latino?

variable.name: AllEthnicity_PC1
variable.description: Principal Component 1 when clustering one individual per family regardless of ethnicity

variable.name: AllEthnicity_PC2
variable.description: Principal Component 2 when clustering one individual per family regardless of ethnicity

variable.name: AllEthnicity_PC3
variable.description: Principal Component 3 when clustering one individual per family regardless of ethnicity

variable.name: AllEthnicity_PC4
variable.description: Principal Component 4 when clustering one individual per family regardless of ethnicity

variable.name: EthnicCluster
variable.description: Ethnic group with which the individual clusters using PC1 and PC2

variable.name: CaucasianCluster
variable.description: Individual clusters in the main non-Hispanic Caucasian cluster

variable.name: Caucasian_PC1
variable.description: Principal Component 1 when clustering one individual from each non-Hispanic Caucasian family

variable.name: Caucasian_PC2
variable.description: Principal Component 2 when clustering one individual from each non-Hispanic Caucasian family

variable.name: UsedInPrecomputes
variable.description: Used in one per family precomputed analysis

variable.name: Educ
variable.description: Subject's education: highest grade or number of years of school completed

variable.name: EvalTest
variable.description: Was cognitive testing administered to the subject?

variable.name: NeuroIM
variable.description: Has brain imaging been performed?

variable.name: ClinDem
variable.description: Is the subject demented?

variable.name: NotDemCi
variable.description: If the subject does not meet criteria for dementia, what is the diagnosis?
variable.value: Not demented, but has other neurological disorder (such as Parkinson disease, MS, etc.)
Questionable dementia (e.g., CDR equals 0.5) or cognitive impairment (MCI, AAMI)

variable.name: DemDx
variable.description: Is the primary clinical dementia diagnosis Alzheimer's disease (AD)?

variable.name: AgeDem
variable.description: At what age did the subject develop dementia symptoms?

variable.name: AgeDxDem
variable.description: At what age was the subject diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease or other non-Alzheimer's dementia?

variable.name: Stroke
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of stroke(s)?

variable.name: StrokeTy
variable.description: What type of stroke did the subject have?

variable.name: StrokeAge
variable.description: At what age did the subject have a stroke?

variable.name: Hyperten
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of hypertension?

variable.name: HyperAge
variable.description: At what age was the subject diagnosed with hypertension?

variable.name: Heart
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of heart disease?

variable.name: HeartAge
variable.description: At what age was the subject diagnosed with heart disease?

variable.name: Diabetes
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of diabetes?

variable.name: DiabetAg
variable.description: At what age was the subject diagnosed with diabetes?

variable.name: DiabeTx
variable.description: Has the subject undergone treatment for diabetes?

variable.name: PDNoDem
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of Parkinson disease?

variable.name: PDClinDx
variable.description: What category of Parkinson disease was the subject diagnosed with?

variable.name: PDAge
variable.description: At what age was the subject diagnosed with Parkinson disease?

variable.name: Depr
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of depression?

variable.name: DeprTx
variable.description: Has the subject undergone treatment for depression?
variable.value: Yes, antidepressants with or without therapy
Yes, electroconvulsive therapy with or without antidepressants/therapy

variable.name: DeprAge
variable.description: At what age was the subject diagnosed with depression?

variable.name: HeadInj
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of head injury?

variable.name: HeadAge
variable.description: At what age did the subject have the head injury?

variable.name: AlcDrug
variable.description: Does the subject have a history of alcohol or drug abuse?

variable.name: AbuseAge
variable.description: At what age was the subject initially diagnosed with alcohol or drug abuse?

variable.name: Story
variable.description: Logical Memory IA - Story Score

variable.name: DigFor
variable.description: Digit Span Forward Score

variable.name: DigBak
variable.description: Digit Span Backward Score

variable.name: Animals
variable.description: Category Fluency - Animals Score

variable.name: Fruits
variable.description: Category Fluency - Fruits and Vegetables Score

variable.name: DigOrd
variable.description: Digit Ordering Score

variable.name: Delay
variable.description: Logical Memory IIA - Story Score

variable.name: Veg
variable.description: Category Fluency - Vegetable Score
